Index.title: Fetching that data for you
Index.hero: Let your next project find you
Index.opensource: Open source, free hub for software developers to be present and ready for next commission work.
Index.visitorBaner: Create a free account to get unlimited access to all profiles

HowItWorks.descriptionOne: Employers will find you based on your skills and availability. You don't need to apply for jobs.
HowItWorks.descriptionTwo: Our platform is open source and we are proud of it. We believe in transparency and community.
HowItWorks.descriptionThree: Our mission is to connect talents with employers from all over the world despite the distance.
HowItWorks.descriptionFour: Creating profile and connecting with employers is free. We want to democratize and simplify the recruitment process.

UserProfile.howItWork: Join us in building the largest, free, open source platform dedicated to connecting software engineers with a world of development opportunities.

TalentSection.title: Find your next talent
TalentSection.description: Explore our growing talents community. Contact as many as you want.

Faq.title: FAQ
Faq.description: Let us know if you have any questions.
Faq.answerOne: Reverse recruiting (also known as reverse job hunting) is an approach in which the roles of jobseekers and employers are reversed. Instead of candidates applying for positions, employers or recruiters actively seek out potential candidates.
Faq.answerTwo: It's really simple - all you need to do is create an account by logging in with your GitHub profile. Then, you'll create a profile by providing information about yourself. Once your profile is approved by our moderators, you're ready to be hunted by employers.
Faq.answerThree: Yes! Using our platform is free. You can create profile, and get hired without any additional costs.
Faq.questionFour: Do I need to have an account on GitHub?
Faq.answerFour: To create a profile, having a GitHub account is necessary as we want to make sure that you are a real developer. We also use GitHub to fetch your profile picture and other public information to make the process of creating a profile as easy as possible. We do not store any GitHub tokens.

Buttons.fillOut: Fill out the form to complete the profile

LoginDev.title: Login as IT specialist
LoginDev.description: Login with authorised Github profile, get found by hunters and also hunt for fellow specialist.

LoginHunter.description: Join and login always with magic link. Hunters don't have public profiles.

PersonalInfo.title: Personal information
PersonalInfo.description: Share personal information to let the recruiters get to know you.
PersonalInfo.name: Full name
PersonalInfo.emailTooltip: Email is connected to your Github profile and cannot be changed
PersonalInfo.bio: Let others know you - write a few sentences about yourself.
PersonalInfo.bioPlaceholder: You can use **markdown** to format your text. [Links](https://devhunting.co) are also supported.
PersonalInfo.slugTooltip: Choose a unique name for your profile link (e.g., codemaster)

LocationPreferences.title: Location preferences
LocationPreferences.description: Share your current qualifications information. You'll be able to change it at any moment.
LocationPreferences.cityTooltip: We use this information to match you with the best job opportunities.
LocationPreferences.remontOnly: I'm looking for remote jobs only
LocationPreferences.languageTooltip: List the languages you speak fluently

WorkInformation.title: Work information
WorkInformation.description: Share your current qualifications information. You'll be able to change it at any moment.
WorkInformation.techstackTooltip: List the technologies you are comfortable with or interested in.
WorkInformation.techstackInfo: Start typing and separate technologies with commas.

ConfirmLeaveModal.title: Finish your Profile to Save
ConfirmLeaveModal.description: Your profile isn't fully completed yet. To save your changes please fill in all fields. If you leave the page now, your progress will be lost.

ConfirmLogoutModal.title: Finish your Profile to Save
ConfirmLogoutModal.description: Your profile isn't fully completed yet. To save your changes please fill in all fields. If you log out now, your progress will be lost.

VerificationModal.approvedText: Your profile is now up and running. Potential partnerships will contact via email. Make sure you're accepting all external messages!
VerificationModal.rejectedText: On your email we've sent you a message with information what you can improve to have your profile acceted.

Auth.loginToPublishDesc: A link will be sent to your email address, which will automatically log you in once clicked.

AddJobVerificationModal.title: Verification in progress
AddJobVerificationModal.description: Your job is currently being verified. Please wait a few moments.

AddJobSuccessModal.title: Job posted successfully
AddJobSuccessModal.description: We’ve selected and notified {jobCandidatesAmount} top candidates for you from over 200 of our specialists. The job preview has also been sent to your email.
AddJobSuccessModal.descriptionNoCandidates: Currently, we don't have specialists that match your job requirements. It may take longer to receive applications, but we'll notify you as soon as we find suitable candidates.

AddJobErrorModal.title: Job contains errors
AddJobErrorModal.description: We found some errors in your job. Please fix the fields to publish the offer.
AddJobErrorModal.verificationFailedDescription: Your job did not meet our quality standards. Please review and improve your job posting.

Jobs.termsRequired: You must accept the terms of the job
Jobs.tagLine: Free platform connecting you with verified IT specialists
Jobs.jobEditSubHeader: Review the order form and ensure that the entered data matches your offer
Jobs.basicInfoDesc: Provide the details of the job so that specialists can assess their suitability.
Jobs.briefTooltip: Help specialists better understand your needs – write a few sentences about your assignment
Jobs.requestQuoteDescription: Your ad will be marked as 'requesting a quote'.
Jobs.budgetDesc: Specify the budget allocated for project implementation so specialists can tailor their offers to your needs.
Jobs.employmentDesc: Choose the employment type, contract type, and work mode to tailor the collaboration to your needs
Jobs.locationDesc: Share your location preferences for the assignment – you can update them at any time.
Jobs.locationCityTooltip: Provide the city so specialists in your area can easily find your offer.
Jobs.remoteOnly: I'm looking for remote candidates only
Jobs.techStackTooltip: Specify the technologies you've selected for your job offer implementation.
Jobs.addJobPageSubHeader: Review the job form and ensure that the entered data matches your offer
Jobs.minBudgetNonNegative: The minimum amount must not be less than 0
Jobs.maxBudgetGreaterThanMin: The maximum amount must be greater than the minimum
Jobs.maxBudgetGreaterThan0: The maximum amount must be greater than 0
Jobs.noJobsMessage: You haven't posted any jobs yet. Add your first job to get started!

Hunter.trustworthy: Post your job and get matched with verified tech talent
Hunter.postDesc: Create a job post and our system automatically converts it into a detailed brief
Hunter.matchDesc: Your job is sent to matched profiles with the right skills and experience
Hunter.connectDesc: Schedule video calls with applicants and set agreements directly
Hunter.verifiedDesc: All developers are verified through their GitHub profiles and past work
Hunter.speedDesc: Our system automatically matches your job with the right specialists

Hunter.story1Quote: Found an amazing developer within days. The matching system really works!
Hunter.story2Quote: The verification process gives real peace of mind when hiring
Hunter.ctaDesc: Post your job now and get matched with verified specialists

AddJobChat.descriptionParagraph: As detailed as possible. You can also paste the content of your job posting.
AddJobChat.placeholder: Describe your job in a few words

Inbox.title: Inbox
Inbox.subtitle: Manage your job negotiations
Inbox.noNegotiations: You don't have any active negotiations
Inbox.noNegotiationsSubtitle: When you apply for a job, your conversations will appear here

HunterTeam.title: Meet Our Team
HunterTeam.descriptionBold: We believe that finding an IT expert should be simple.
HunterTeam.description: We connect visionaries with specialists, eliminating barriers and bureaucracy. We create open source because technology should be accessible and transparent.

HunterFAQ.title: Most Frequently Asked Questions
HunterFAQ.desc: Find answers to frequently asked questions or contact us. We will be happy to help and clear up any doubts.

accordeon.answerOne: Yes, adding an order is fully free.
accordeon.questionTwo: How do I get information from specialists?
accordeon.answerTwo: Specialists who sign up for an assignment will be able to connect with the Principal via the internal chat available on the platform. The Principal, on the other hand, will receive an email notification of their willingness to cooperate.
accordeon.questionThree: How many orders can I post?
accordeon.answerThree: At this point you can add one order per day.

HunterWhyWorth.title: Why use DevHunting?
HunterWhyWorth.freeDescription: Add your job without any fees and receive offers from IT specialists.
HunterWhyWorth.simpleDescription: Don't waste time searching - programmers will contact you with tailored proposals.
HunterWhyWorth.techDescription: Describe your idea, and AI will transform it into a project brief for the right experts.

HunterHero.title: Find the perfect IT specialist for your project
HunterHero.titleMobile: Hire the Best IT Specialist - No Time Wasted on Searching
HunterHero.subtitle: Describe the job in your own words, or use a template for the most popular projects
HunterHero.aiAnalyzingMessage: Our AI assistant is analyzing your description...
HunterHero.mockText_privateAIassistant:
I'm looking for a private AI assistant solution to support my work. I need a system that:
Automatically manages calendar and meetings
Processes and categorizes emails
Prepares draft responses to messages
Reminds of important tasks and deadlines
HunterHero.mockText_website:
I'm looking for a solution to create a modern website for my company. I need a system that:
Provides intuitive navigation and responsiveness
Integrates with social media
Offers a content management system
Allows easy addition of new subpages
HunterHero.mockText_onlinePlatformDesign:
I'm looking for a solution to design an online platform. I need a system that:
Offers modern and consistent design
Provides intuitive user experience
Adapts to different devices
Allows easy customization of elements
HunterHero.mockText_paymentSystemIntegration:
I'm looking for a solution to integrate payment systems in my business. I need a system that:
Handles various electronic payment methods
Automatically records transactions
Generates financial reports
Ensures secure data processing
HunterHero.mockText_mobileApplication:
I need to create a new mobile application for my company. I would like it to be:
Attractive and professional
SEO optimized
Responsive and easy to use
Contain information about our services and products
HunterHero.mockText_dataManagementSystem:
I need to create a new data management system for my company. I would like it to be:
Flexible and scalable
Include automatic data processing and analysis features
Allow integration with other systems
HunterHero.mockText_databaseMigration:
I need to migrate my database from one system to another. I would like it to be:
Safe and efficient
Maintain compatibility with previous data
Minimize downtime
HunterHero.mockText_automation:
I need to create process automation in my company. I would like it to be:
Flexible and scalable
Include automatic data processing features
Allow integration with other systems
HunterHero.mockText_iOSAndroidApplication:
I need to create a new mobile application for iOS and Android. I would like it to be:
Attractive and professional
SEO optimized
Responsive and easy to use
Contain information about our services and products
HunterHero.mockText_automationBot:
I need to create process automation in my company. I would like it to be:
Flexible and scalable
Include automatic data processing features
Allow integration with other systems
HunterHero.mockText_designSystem:
I need to create a new design system for my company. I would like it to be:
Flexible and scalable
Include automatic data processing and analysis features
Allow integration with other systems
HunterHero.mockText_QAtesting:
I need to create a new QA system for my company. I would like it to be:
Flexible and scalable
Include automatic data processing and analysis features
Allow integration with other systems
HunterHero.mockText_APIintegration:
I need to create a new API system for my company. I would like it to be:
Flexible and scalable
Include automatic data processing and analysis features
Allow integration with other systems

HunterRiskReducers.expertsDescription: Work with verified developers, testers, and designers at every level of expertise.
HunterRiskReducers.specialistsDescription: From React, through Python, to UX/UI tools – our experts know all the technologies needed to complete your project.

Metadata.title: Commission projects to the best specialists – GoodDevHunting
Metadata.description: Add a job and get found by the best IT specialists – no fees, no intermediaries. Don't waste time searching – programmers will contact you with tailored proposals. You set the terms of cooperation together – simple, transparent, and stress-free.

HunterHowItWorks.describeNeeds: Describe your needs and add your request
HunterHowItWorks.exampleClientPosition: CEO of a startup building chatbots for patients
HunterHowItWorks.exampleRequest: I need a chatbot specialist who will build me a chatbot for patients based on their medical history and doctor's recommendations.
HunterHowItWorks.receiveOffersDescription: Receive applications from verified specialists interested in your project.
HunterHowItWorks.hireExpertDescription: Review profiles and choose the person who best fits your project and start collaboration.
HunterHowItWorks.clientInvites: David invites you to the project:
